name: Signal Strength
description:
Signal Strength is a single player reflex game that uses only the mouse! Take control of two games at once and balance between defending your player and chaining together combos!

Instructions:

Use mouse to move. Press the left/right mouse button to switch to controlling the left/right player. Bash into enemies to kill them and get points! Doing so will also take away a hit point. Switch back to a player to re-fill their hit points.  Do this for as long as possible and see how high you can get your score!

This game has been open sourced! You can check out the repo here. Also make sure to check out UniPlay, the open source framework we used to make this game!
